title: Mobile Simulation Training for Enhancing Medical Team Communication Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and understanding of organizational workflows
context.additional_context: Content optimized for smartphone-based learning environments, with 15-minute modules provided 3–4 times weekly

learning_goals: Apply TeamSTEPPS communication tools (e.g., SBAR) in real medical scenarios with 80% accuracy
Enhance the ability to resolve interprofessional healthcare conflicts through 3-stage virtual role-playing (situation recognition-strategy development-execution)
Improve collaborative performance scores by 25% or more compared to baseline in mobile-based simulation assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
